typical.name: Typical
typical.instructions: Please indicate whether you have had the following symptoms during the past 24 hours, and how severe they were

qs.question: Frequent urination of small amounts of urine (going to the toilet very often)
Urgent urination (a sudden and uncontrollable urge to urinate)
Feeling incomplete bladder emptying (still feel like you could urinate again after urination)
Feeling pain not associated with urination in the lower abdomen (below the belly button)
Flank pain (pain in one or both sides of the lower back)
Abnormal vaginal discharge (amount, color and/or odor)
Discharge from the urethra (urinary opening) , without urination
Fever/high body temperature (Please indicate if measured)
Please indicate how much discomfort you have experienced because of your symptoms in the past 24 hours (Mark answer that suits you best)

answer.none: Feeling no discomfort (No symptoms at all. I feel as good as usual)
answer.mild: Feeling mild discomfort (I feel a somewhat worse than usual)
answer.moderate: Feeling moderate discomfort (I feel quite bad)

qs.question: Please indicate how your symptoms have interfered with your everyday activities/work in the past 24 hours (Mark answer that suits you best)

answer.none: Not interfered at all (Working as usual on a working day)
answer.mild: Mildly interfered (Working is associated with some discomfort)
answer.severe: Severely interfered (Usual work or activities are almost impossible)

qs.question: Please indicate how your symptoms have interfered with your social activities (visiting people, meeting with friends, etc) in the past 24 hours (Mark answer that suits you best)

answer.none: Not interfered at all (Working as usual on a working day)
answer.mild: Mildly interfered (Working is associated with some discomfort)
answer.severe: Severely interfered (Usual work or activities are almost impossible)

additional.name: Additional
additional.instructions: Please indicate whether you have the followings today

qs.question: Signs of menopausal syndrome (e.g. hot flashes)
Please indicate if you experienced any changes in your symptoms since the first time you completed this questionnaire:

answer.normal: Yes I feel normal (All symptoms have gone away)
answer.better: Yes, I feel much better (Most of symptoms have gone away)
answer.somebetter: Yes, I feel somewhat better (Only some symptoms are gone)
answer.barely: No, there are barely any changes (I still have about the same symptoms)
answer.worse: Yes, I feel worse (My condition is worse)

answer.islander: Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander

answer.active: Highly active (More than 3 miles of daily walk or equivalent exersise)
answer.moderateActive: Moderately active (1.5-3 miles of daily walk or equivalent exersise)
answer.lightlyActive: Lightly active (Intentional exercise every day for at least 30 minutes)
answer.sedentaryActive: Sedentary active (Less than 30 minutes a day of intentional exercise)

ejacul.question: Rate in scores how difficult  for you hold up (control) offensive of  ejaculation?
How often your ejaculation occurs earlier than desired moment?
ejacul.answerB: Less than half of  the cases
ejacul.answerD: More than half of the cases

ejacul.question: How often do you have premature ejaculation (at the very beginning of vaginal penetration)?
ejacul.answerB: Less than half of  the cases
ejacul.answerD: More than half of the cases

ejacul.question: Duration of sexual intercourse (from penetration until ejaculation)?
Does premature ejaculation occur only when you change your partner?
ejacul.answerA: Ocurs very rarely, and only when I change partner, it is OK with constant
ejacul.answerB: Sometimes occurs when I change the partner
ejacul.answerC: Half of the cases when you change partner
ejacul.answerD: More than half of cases when you change partner
ejacul.answerE: No, not only, occurs even with a constant partner

ejacul.question: Do you think that your partner is satisfied with sexual life?
Do you have before or during intercourse, anxiety, restlessness?
Does it bother you that ejaculation occur faster than you would like?

controlQA.question: Have you experienced early ejaculation from the very first days of your sexual life?
